original_text: On the seventh day the priest is to examine that person, and if it is spreading in the skin, the priest shall pronounce them unclean; it is a defiling skin disease.
korean_text: 이레 만에 제사장이 그를 진찰할지니 만일 병이 크게 피부에 퍼졌으면 그가 그를 부정하다 할 것은 나병의 환부임이니라

sentences.original_text: the priest is to examine that person
and if it is spreading in the skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그것이 피부에 퍼지고 있다면

sentences.original_text: the priest shall pronounce them unclean
it is a defiling skin disease
